body.raw:
{
  "resourceType" : "SearchParameter",
  "id" : "FlagCategory",
  "url" : "http://localhost:8080/fhir/SearchParameter/FlagCategory",
  "version" : "1",
  "name" : "Search for Flag.category",
  "title" : "Search for Flag.category",
  "derivedFrom" : "http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/Resource-id",
  "status" : "active",
  "description" : "Search by category in the Flag resource",
  "code" : "category",
  "base" : ["Flag"],
  "type" : "token",
  "expression" : "Flag.category",
  "xpathUsage": "normal"
}

{
  "resourceType" : "SearchParameter",
  "id" : "FlagCode",
  "url" : "http://localhost:8080/fhir/SearchParameter/FlagCode",
  "version" : "1",
  "name" : "Search for Flag.code",
  "title" : "Search for Flag.code",
  "derivedFrom" : "http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/Resource-id",
  "status" : "active",
  "description" : "Search by code in the Flag resource",
  "code" : "code",
  "base" : ["Flag"],
  "type" : "token",
  "expression" : "Flag.code",
  "xpathUsage": "normal"
}

{
    "resourceType": "SearchParameter",
    "id": "FlagDetail",
    "url": "http://localhost:8080/fhir/SearchParameter/FlagDetail",
    "name": "SearchParameter for flag detail extension used in Flag",
    "title": "SearchParameter for Flag.extension where url=http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/flag-detail",
    "status": "active",
    "description": "Search using extension for flag detail extension in Flag resource",
    "code": "detail",
    "base": ["Flag"],
    "type": "reference",
    "expression": "Flag.extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/flag-detail')",
    "target": ["Condition", "Flag", "Consent"]
}

item.name: Return all NRAF associated resources for a patient
Get all top level Flags (FGM, CPIS flags don't exist but would be returned if they did) (not including provenance here)

header.value: HAPI FHIR 6.10.0 REST Server (FHIR Server; FHIR 4.0.1/R4)

item.name: Get all RA records (flags) for a patient (not including provenance here)

response.name: New Request

header.value: HAPI FHIR 6.10.0 REST Server (FHIR Server; FHIR 4.0.1/R4)

item.name: Get RA record (flag) for a patient and restrict by adjustment code (not including provenance here)

response.name: Get RA record (flag) for a patient based on adjustment code, i.e. Flag.code (not including provenance here)

header.value: HAPI FHIR 6.10.0 REST Server (FHIR Server; FHIR 4.0.1/R4)

item.name: Get Flag by Category and Code
